items.vipPickup: VIP airport pick-up service with a private car
items.internalTransfers: Internal transfers between all activities and sites included in the package

items.luxury: Luxury serviced apartments or boutique hotels
items.privateLodgings: Private lodgings with a natural or rustic touch
items.privateShared: Private or shared rooms arranged upon request

items.soundTherapy: Sound therapy, float therapy, Reiki, chakra work, and conscious breathing
items.psychological: Psychological support sessions with specialists, available upon request

items.selfDiscovery: Self-discovery activities, creative writing, and artistic workshops
items.localCommunities: Interaction with local communities and traditional culinary experiences

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch

hero.title: Recharge Your Body
hero.subtitle: Wellness IV Therapy in Jordan — Delivered by Licensed Experts. Restore your energy & glow while enjoying your retreat.

whatIsIVDrip.title: What is an IV Drip?
whatIsIVDrip.feature1: Our medical-grade intravenous therapy delivers essential vitamins, minerals, and hydration directly into your bloodstream — for instant results.
whatIsIVDrip.feature2: Each session is led by licensed medical professionals using sterile equipment in a calm, comfortable setting.
whatIsIVDrip.feature3: Boost your energy, hydrate deeply, and feel renewed.

whatYoullFeel.title: What You'll Feel
whatYoullFeel.feel2: Hydration after travel or sun exposure
whatYoullFeel.feel3: Boost your energy, hydrate deeply, and feel renewed.
whatYoullFeel.feel4: Tailored cocktails based on your needs

includedInStay.title: Included in Your Stay
includedInStay.description: All IV sessions are part of your retreat experience. Stay in our handpicked wellness residences near the Red Sea or Dead Sea, combining comfort with healing.

cta.title: Ready to refresh your body and mind?
cta.description: [Reserve Your Spot] — Limited availability per retreat date.

PackageDetails.ctaDescription: Designed for newlyweds or couples marking a special milestone, this journey is fully personalized to reflect each partner's unique essence. For those seeking deeper emotional connection, optional counseling sessions can be added upon request.
